basics.name: Ksenia Gulyaeva
basics.label: Junior Software Developer
basics.summary:
I am learning to code and applying my skills for personal projects for around 2 years already and want to start a software developer career now.
I used to work outside of IT (procurement), in 2018 I've created and published a mobile application for both iOS and Android and understood that I want to expand my programming knowledge and work in a team of like-minded people who are passionate about it as well.
I've finished a couple of Coursera courses and watched video series on programming fundamentals and now working on personal projects to get more experience, apply the knowledge I have already and to have fun.

work.summary: My first programming job in a visual effects studio supporting the needs of internal teams. I had to give it up because of relocation to Amsterdam.
highlights: Created backup/recovery script for corporate files library and visual interface for its configuration in PyQT;
Started design and implementation of VFX render manager interface, was not finished because I had to leave.

courses: Diving into Python, coursework: sockets client-server application using asyncio
Programming for Everybody (Getting Started with Python)
Chinese language internship in Peking University in 2005

publications.name: Planet Parade game for iOS
publications.summary: Mastermind-like videogame I've developed using Xamarin framework for C#
